review: I love it, I just have to figure out how to search for the games I want instead of games already loaded. And I love how I can select something on YouTube on another device and have it play on the TV.💜💜💜💜💜💜💜

We also have a Roku stick and Chromecast.  Both work just fine with our router and internet speed.  Tried the new TV Stick.  Not good.  The programs are constantly buffering.  Completely annoying.  Back to the other two.
